recommendations: "In my direct management of Mark, he played a very important role in the design and navigation of a critical database and data distribution platform. In addition to knowing the database development components he also understood the entire business process and the front-end applications. With his training on the entire Microsoft stack he was also capable of performing C#/.Net development.  He also adopted the use of tools such as Informatica and Tableau.  This allowed mark to do excellent work as an analyst, developer, operations, and production support.  Mark fulfilled a 24x7 on call role for the 4 plus years I worked with him.  He performed as a liaison among the business managers, the product owners, software development and QA staff coordinating the design and implementation through the entire development cycle to product release. He was always available and open to questions and discussions regarding platform. He is a multi-talented individual that I believe would perform well under any circumstances. I highly recommend him without reservations."— Bradley Scott, Sr Manager – Mobile and Web Development, Level (3), Managed Mark directly at Charles Schwab
